Posts.Content: Hi Karen           Thanks for getting bk to me , lovely to read you are cancer free yay!!! It seems so long to go when your first starting out, thanks for your advice I'm going to ask about mouth wash as my gums are a bit sore today to, how many chemo sessions did you have ? And was it fec you had to ? Also did you feel the same each session or did it vary ? Thanks x sorry for all the questions lol its nice to chat to some one who has been thru it xx many thanks Lisa x
Posts.Title: Just started chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Sarah  I have 5 more to ! Yucky stuff !!! Will all be worth it when we are better x good luck with getting your meds sorted it's nasty feeling sick x please keep in touch we can help each other through x Lisa x
Posts.Title: Just started chemo

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I'm all very new to this have just started my chemo had my first one a week ago today, was very sick first day sat slept most off the day and sun started to feel better , I'm OK now just have a really dry throat is this normal? Should I expect to feel worse soon or is that it do you think? Any advice is welcome many thanks Lisa xx
Posts.Title: Just started chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Sarah  I'm sorry to hear your feeling sick to its awful isn't it , all I can say is it does get better are you on the same chemo as me fec? , I felt sick for 3 days then it did start to fade a bit I found eating a ginger biscuit in the morning helped me an a walk in the fresh air helps the head aches , my throat is very dry at the mo and I'm a bit achy now just over a week since chemo and starting to feel like me again which is nice, I'm nervous about doing it all again in a couple off weeks but have to think off the positives and think worse case it's a week poorly then two OK, I didn't go for the cold cap was it OK? Good luck with your next chemo how many do you have to have ? X Lisa xxx
Posts.Title: Just started chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Mark thanks for getting back to me , I have been writing a chemo diary to see how I've been feeling so I can look back on , I don't seem to be that tired at the moment have two small children to keep me busy and I have found getting out side with them has helped, hopping by the 2nd treatment to be feeling even better so I can prepare myself for a bad few days , I do have a stiff neck and bit off head ache some mornings to . Hope ur treatment is going well many thanks Lisa x
Posts.Title: Just started chemo

Posts.Content: Morning g n j thanks for getting back to me sorry my treatment is fec yes , I've been writing a diary so I can look back on how I've been feeling very good idea, as I said the first 3 days were the worst the day i had chemo I was very sick I'm going to chat to the nurse see if they can help with that, each day I've got a bit better , I've had a few head aches and bit off a stiff neck to not sure if it's normal? Tiredness has been OK I've been out for walks etc to get fresh air , I've just brought some manuka honey to help the dry throat drinking it with hot water seems to help a bit, have chemo every 3 weeks so hopping to be feeling better by the next one , hope ur treatment is going well thanks for getting back to me xx
Posts.Title: Just started chemo
